name: Mars Mayhem
description:
Created By: Nick Fraus

This project was made for CAS 117

Assets provided by Michigan State University, freepik.com

Changes/Modification:

  • Redesigned the style of game from a platformer, to an arcade game in which you defend yourself against waves of robots
  • Created a cave styled arcade map
  • Added 3 guns into the game
    • First upgrade increases the fire rate of the gun
    • Second upgrade increases the fire rate of the gun, and makes it automatic
  • Added Waves and money, as well as their respective UI counterparts
  • Created a shop UI after every wave, to upgrade the gun before proceeding to the next wave.
    • Added a Wave Completed! message before the shop UI is active
  • Updated the environment in the menu screen
  • Created a multi-position spawner for enemies
  • Created scripts for gun management and wave management
  • Altered  many of the already given scripts

There are two easter eggs in the game, try to find them! (A message, and a glowing crystal)
